name: Laci
text: The slowest and most unprofessional court house in Alabama I believe. . It’s unbelievable how long it takes to even GET a court date for custody that is IMPORTANT or anything else.

name: Joseph Price
text: This is a land of corruption and greed. Nothing free about it

name: John LaGrone
text: Affordable Decks like s the People

name: Sven Holiday
text: Got my passport there with no issues. Friendly staff.

name: Tammy McGee
text: Great info

name: Bob Waldrip
text: Needed to get a copy of the deed on my house and property purchased 42 years ago. The two ladies there were very friendly and helpful in finding the information I needed. Great help!

name: Jesus Christ
text: Thanks again for the updates

name: Element 47
text: It's ok as far as courthouses go. I hate the stairs. And I'm not exactly sure if there is an easy way for handicapped people to get up and down from the street to the door. I imagine there would be, however I didn't see one that I can remember.

name: The Trainmobile
text:
Would be 5* without the Confederate statue. Just saying. :/

Edit: I'm keeping my promise. 😏

name: Aashish T
text: I have visited this place twice for my vehicle registration etc. My experience was good but it's very hard to find parking space nearby.

name: Nathan Hovezak
text: Exquisite. Splendid.

name: Johans Romero
text:
Tried to get my license plates switched over from California about two months ago, the lady who helped me said I needed the title number and gave me a form to fill out. After two months of back and forth with my financing company they finally got the title number to me, I returned to the office and gave them the information and they said they needed a copy of the title. I called my financing company and they faxed over a copy to the licensing office, which didn’t have the title number printed on it, but I had it printed on the form which they had given me.

I return to inform them a copy was faxed and then they said I needed the original title. The lady who helped me said ‘I’m gonna get you a new form’ then proceeded to just blot out with pen, on the form I already had filled out, the words that said ‘copy’ and ‘fax to’ then said I need to have my financing company mail the original title. I asked her why was I told differently the first time, and then I asked her if scratching words out with pen on an already filled out form counts as a new form, because that seems confusing and unprofessional, and she started getting visibly angry. I said thank you for your help and left before things escalated, but she was rude and condescending, and unwilling to answer my questions. I can’t believe how unprofessional and disorganized this office is. I am beyond angry and disappointed.

name: Matt Johnson
text: AWFUL! Steer clear of this place. There is a free one-way shuttle service, but the seats are uncomfortable. Upon arrival, they take a photo of you for their Instagram page. Not the most welcoming place I have ever visited. The bed in breakfast was well under par.

name: Josiah Thomas
text: Staff has always been helpful and I've never had to stand in a line for anything.

name: Tauhidur Rahman
text: I went to register my car. Ppl are very helpful there.

name: zach smithson
text: I was pleasantly surprised with how easy it was, and how friendly the staff was when I had to renew my license and register to vote

name: Stephanie Munsey
text:
I received a ticket for driving on expired tags. 1 yr ago, when I was SUPPOSE to be renewing my tags and taking care of life’s little duties, just like normal citizens do every day of the week. I was being kicked out of my home that I had been living in for the past 2 yrs by my PSYCHOLOGICALLY CHALLENGED “best friend of over 20yrs. As a 100% unemployable Navy Veteran my finances are limiting to say the least. I got my tags renewed  the very first Monday after receiving the ticket on Sat. I did not pay my ticket early becuz it took me 3 mnths to save the extra money out of my strained budget. I went to court in my appt date. My name was called up to a table, before the judge had entered the room, and told my ticket had been dismissed!!!!!!! Thus saving me from paying the ADDITIONAL $200 for restitution AND court fees. Everyone was friendly and polite. Although I can NOT think of any reason I would want to visit the Madison Co. Court House again. My experience was surprising and very low stress!
SWM

name: Joel Hamm
text: In and out very quickly !!

name: igliveplug
text: They do not answer the phone

name: Jennifer McClure
text: Not happy with the way they  Do the employees

name: pako Silva
text: Not everyone will like to be here

name: Timothy Boullemet
text:
Specifically the License office. This isn't Publix obviously.
However,
Service is needlessly slow. Rude, unhelpful staff.

name: Brandi/shiann Sims
text: I've had a great experience from the time that I got pulled over. The sheriff was so nice I was doing 65 in a 45 I explained to him that I was late for work he was going to let me go until he and I discovered at the same time that my license was suspended but that was Lee county's fault. I've missed court dates and constantly have to call to make sure my dates are correct and each time they are pleasant. The only thing I don't like is the dress code 😆

name: Mary Charlot
text: Great experience. I was able to get information I needed without a problem.

name: Tia House
text: This place needs to be shut down! The judges are corrupt with the exception of judge Collins. The DA is a joke. Doesn’t even know the case until 5 minutes of you arriving. The secretaries are not knowledgeable of proper procedures. They don’t care about the people. They don’t care about the victim. They don’t care about perjury. The judges are prejudice and insensitive. They are just as much as criminals as the people they try in court! Avoid at all costs

name: Tyler Harris
text: Great Customer Service

name: Alex S
text: Rude and unprofessional

name: Lisa Hall
text: Why is it when you walk in the door at the circuit clerks office you feel as if you yourself are a criminal? I've never been arrested, I work, I pay taxes, I go to church and I live a Christian life. I don't have a criminal background, nor do I have a guilty conscious. As you enter the clerks office your treated as if you are guilty just by entering the building. They want respect but lack respect themselves. Prayers to all of our law enforcement and those who have to deal with real crime or real criminals but I am neither.

name: rnakwi
text: Good customer service

name: BABY Boi
text: Took my money !!!

name: Tarica Neal
text: Getting it done

name: Connie Baldwin
text: Judge in Case was fair.

name: Rackem Willie
text: Nothing needed

name: James king
text: Good

name: Pat Crawford
text: All of the Russell county local government is corrupt and doesn't care about the people who pay taxes!

name: Robert Wilson
text: I work here.

name: Sara London
text: The ladies that work in the office are extremely rude.

name: Desminique Rowell
text: I recommend this place over the Auburn satellite office any day. The courthouse has very nice people in there. If u go to Auburn they will give you so much trouble it's ridiculous. It doesn't matter if you have the proper documentation there are a headache in Auburn. So if I were you I'll go the extra mile and drive to the courthouse...unless you get lucky and get Mrs. Dellia Preston so sweet.

name: Randy Ruffin, Sr.
text:
I was not able to talk with anyone presently.  The main operator was nice, and the extension
I was trying to reach was busy at the moment.  The voice mail was clear.  This is normal this day and time they probably need more staff.

name: M Stevens
text: Love the architectural​ qualities.

name: Julia Cassen
text: Beautiful historic building. When you register your car here they give you your tags on the spot!

name: Brittany Harry
text: Very respectful and always helpful when I go.

name: 3ddy maldonado
text:
(Translated by Google) It is a place where they serve you with kindness and fast ...!

(Original)
Es un lugar donde te atienden con amabilidad y rápido...!
